name: Scott Weaver
title: Senior WordPress Engineer
about: I have over 15 years of professional experience in web development, focused primarily on  PHP-based platforms. For the past 6 years, I've worked extensively with WordPress from back to front. And for 5 of those years, I have also been using React/Redux to build enhanced experiences. I also have great experience in the eCommerce space. I write clean code with easy-to-read documentation, have strong analytical skills and love bug solving, learning and a good challenge.

Enjoys learning, challenges and working with team members to accomplish goals

references.from: Nicholas Campbell, Front-end Developer at Sagepath
references.text: Scott Weaver is not only a highly-skilled developer and a quick-witted problem solver. He is also an even-tempered leader that develops teams with humor, patience, and a deep understanding of necessary technologies.

references.from: Asaf Zamir, CTO at Cloud With Me
references.text: Scott is one of the most gifted and reliable developers I've had the pleasure to work with. We worked remotely in a dynamic team, where he was able to both deliver on tough deadlines, as well as keep his teammates up to speed. I would highly recommend him as a rock solid foundation to a high level dev team.

references.from: Javier Martinez, Software Developer at BLITZ
references.text: Scott has always been very knowledgeable as a developer. He has very strong PHP, and MySQL skills as well as a desire to learn as much as possible about subjects that interest him. In the year that I worked with him I learned a lot about web development, and even now that we don't work together but stayed friends, I continue to learn from him. I would highly recommend Scott to anyone or any company that needs a qualified developer.
